Uses of Interface
almost.functional.reactive.Observer

Packages that use Observer
almost.functional.reactive Package includes rudimentary reactive style code. 
 

Uses of Observer in almost.functional.reactive
 

Classes in almost.functional.reactive that implement Observer
 class BroadcastObserver<T>
          A single Observer that allow for multiple Observers to observe a single event.
 

Methods in almost.functional.reactive that return Observer
 Observer<T> BroadcastObserver.addCompletedConsumer(Consumer<Boolean>... consumers)
          Add multiple completed Consumers to this observer.
 Observer<T> BroadcastObserver.addErrorConsumer(Consumer<Throwable>... consumers)
          Add multiple error Consumers to this observer.
 Observer<T> BroadcastObserver.addNextConsumer(Consumer<T>... consumers)
          Add multiple next Consumers to this observer.
 

Constructors in almost.functional.reactive with parameters of type Observer
Promise(Supplier<T> supplier, Observer<T> observer)
          Create a Promise based on a given supplier and with an Observer.
